text: [Music]
hello I'm Ragu a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Dallas today
I'm going to show you how users can
automate the AWS data migration service
task log delion process to avoid storage
full on the replication instance let's
get started AWS DMS task logs are
deleted every 7 days for all replication
instances to delete the logs more often
you can create a script and automate the
process to run every day or at the
frequency you want this example uses
simple python code to automate the task
error log deletion for the provided task
Arn using AWS Lambda after logging in to
the AWS Management console navigate to
the Lambda console and then choose the
AWS region containing your DMs resources
from the top right hand side corner from
the drop- down
list from the functions panel choose
create
function select order from
scratch enter a function
name for runtime choose python 3.8
for change default execution role choose
create a new role with basic Lambda
permissions please note that the IM am
role name that Lambda
creates choose create
function open the AWS identity and
access Management
console select policies from the left
hand side and select create cre
policy copy this Json example into the
policy editor and choose next
tags you can add any tags and then
choose next review provide a name to the
policy such as DMS logs Del provide a
description and then choose create
policy select roles from the left hand
side
and then open the I am role that the
Lambda function
created attach DMS logs delici policy to
the role created by Lambda
function open the Lambda console select
functions from the left hand side and
then open the function that you created
for function code enter the following
code and then choose deploy
choose test and then enter event name
with the default
template choose
create choose test again the code runs
without
errors after performing these steps the
DMS task status changes to
modifying at the same time you can see
that the DMS task error logs under the
replication instance are
deleted you must run this code every
time that you want to delete the logs
for a particular DMS task now let's see
how we can schedule this to run every
day using Lambda
scheduler open the Lambda
console select functions from the left
hand side and then open the function
that you have created
from designer choose add
trigger from the drop-down list choose
event Bridge cloudwatch
events for rule choose create a new
rule enter rule name and Rule
description for schedule expression
enter rate one
day choose and
add after completing these steps the
automation is set up to delete the
specified DMS task logs every day thanks
for watching and happy cloud computing
from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
